=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rotary Tattoo Machine Pen Machine Powerful Motor DC Cable Connector WB-1
Review Date: 2017/06/05
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 2 inches; 5.6 Ounces'}
Review Text: I'm torn...I don't like dragonhawks customer service, but this machine is great for sharing like really great.  Its ok at lining but the sharing is amazing it blends black and gray amazingly!
Review Title: Im TORN...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Russ Abbott - RED Tattoo Stencil Sampler 25 Sheets of Transfer Paper, 25 Transfer Gels, 25 Tattooing Gels
Review Date: 2017/06/20
Product Description: ["S8's revolutionary tattoo stenciling system, in one convenient and limited edition system kit box featuring the work of Artist Russ Abbott. What's inside? -RED Tattoo Stencil- A revolutionary red freehand and thermal stencil paper. -RED Stencil Transfer Gel- Prepares and cleans the skin, then acts as a transfer medium. -RED Tattooing Gel- A gel that improves ink saturation, needle performance and reduces inflammation. S8 proudly introduces the RED Tattoo Stencil Transfer System. A new beginning. The first ever red-colored freehand and thermal ready stencil paper. The first ever stencil transfer gel that prepares and protects the skin. The first ever tattooing gel that seals the stencil to the skin and creates a near zero-degree coefficient of drag. All designed to work perfectly in tandem. About the Artist: Russ Abbott is a pioneer. Since he began his tattooing career in 1997, Abbott has become a leader in the American Illustrative tattooing movement. But Abbott is not an easy artist to classify. His tattoos are spectacular pastiches, incorporating subjects from literature and American folk art, baroque stylistic flourishes, and sacred geometries. The constant in Abbott’s work is his understanding and application of color theory. The scope of his palette is evident in many of his large illustrative pieces, which demonstrate both his eye for color and his tremendous technical aptitude. Abbott has also been a vocal advocate for the role of digital design and layout in tattooing. He does much of his tattoo design work- from mandalas to outdoor scenes- on computers and has proven the role of software in visualizing tattoos on the body. Abbott owns and tattoos out of Ink & Dagger Tattoo in Georgia, and travels internationally to educate fellow tattooers as well as the general public."]
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '14.2 x 8.7 x 1.4 inches; 1.19 Pounds'}
Review Text: This stuff is worthless!  DO NOT BUY!  I purchased it for one cuz it's red. Something new and cool, but way wrong this stuff don't transfer for crap and too pricey to not work!
Review Title: Something new and cool, but way wrong this stuff don't transfer for ...
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Aluminum Self Lock Tattoo Grip Tattoo Tube For Tattoo Red Color
Review Date: 2017/07/07
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4 x 3.3 x 1.5 inches; 4 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really enjoy these type of tubes, but i rarely use needles anymore.  I use cartridges
Review Title: Four Stars
Rating: 4.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals a consumer primarily engaged in tattoo equipment, displaying mixed sentiments towards products largely due to quality and price sensitivity. Consistent ratings in the low threes to low fours indicate a struggle to find satisfactory items, particularly in the rotary machine category. While some machines receive praise for performance, there's a clear frustration with the price-to-quality ratio, with multiple instances expressing that comparable products exist at lower prices.

Common themes center around equipment used for tattooing, with a specific interest in both traditional and rotary machines. The buyer appears to value functionality in machine performance, especially regarding line work and blending capabilities, but is often let down by customer service experiences, suggesting a desire for a reliable purchasing environment.

Quality preferences include a notable aversion to products that do not meet expected performance standards, especially when perceived as overpriced. There’s an acute sensitivity to the inadequacy of materials, as seen with the disappointing experiences surrounding stencil gels and disposable cartridges. Overall, this consumer demonstrates a keen interest in experimentation with new technologies and methods in tattooing, yet remains firmly grounded in practical expectations regarding quality and value for money.

target_interaction.text: All the same gauge but not horrible
target_interaction.title_meta: ROSENICE Tattoo Spring Set Front Back Rear Tattoo Machine Springs Supplies Kit -24 Pieces
features: Can be used by many machine makers.
Very convenient and easy to operate by yourself.
description: The machine springs supplies kit is made of stainless steel, and can be used by many machine makers. It's very convenient and easy to operate by yourself. And it is the best choice and good accessories for professional tattooists.
- Material: Stainless Steel. - Length of Front Springs: Approx. 44mm and 33mm. - Length of Rear Springs: Approx. 35mm. - Thickness: 0.4mm.
